label: Enable Search Engine Select
description: Globally enables or disables the floating search engine switcher UI.

label: Remember UI Position
description: Saves the vertical position of the switcher after you drag it. Disabling this will reset the position to the middle of the screen on each new search.

label: Enable Debug Mode
description: Outputs detailed script information to the Browser Console (Ctrl+Shift+J) for troubleshooting.
